p.a: April 24, 2020 Coldwater End of Year Update

p.strong:
The mission of the Coldwater Exempted Village Schools,designated as one of Ohio's "B.E.S.T." schools,
is to guarantee the best education for all students by using the quality resources in a caring environment.
